thread.section_title: Hudson Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Big Apple
thread.title_full: Big Apple - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: B6611GHneilb
title: Big Apple
text:
Room smaller than average, Bar prices excessive $10 a pint of beer.
Approx Â£240 charged to credit card on arrival as security deposit!! Hope it's recharged to my card ASAP on departure.
Staff very attentive, room clean and lovely and warm as we were there during very cold weather.
Good Delis nearby for breakfasts.
Didn't use Hotel to eat.
3 bars, lovely library theme in one.
